website_summaries.verdict: Cost-effective, shatter-proof tempered glass dive mask that provides an extra-large viewing area, which can be used on its own or paired with a snorkel mouthpiece.
pros: Fits snugly against the face without irritation and keeps water out
Fits multiple sizes from child to adult
If glass is treated before use, mask does not fog
The glass doesn't scratch like that on some inexpensive brands
cons: Some adult users feel it runs a bit small, and facial hair can prevent a tight seal around the face

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best pair of snorkel mask I've purchased. The price is great. And the fit is really comfortable as soon as you put them on you can feel the seal around you eyes and nose. And unlike other snorkel masks the area that covers your nose is very soft and flexible and doesn't dig in or irritate the bottom part of nose above my lip.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelene G

customer_reviews.title: Cool design& good quality. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cool glasses! Well adhere and do not pass water. I especially like the cool design - no one has such transparent! ))) My girlfriend and I had a fun swim in these glasses on the Miami beach. No scratches in a few weeks of intensive ospolzvaniya not found. The glasses continue to be transparent and everything is clearly visible in them. I pulled a couple of cool big corals from the sandy bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Head band is attached to the face suction ring
customer_reviews.text: I have a pool and many grandkids so I've learned a bit about play masks. Firstly, kids who are not competitive swimmers prefer these masks that cover their noses to goggles. They have more fun with these masks. You'll be better off with a model that the head band is not attached to the face seal. When water leaks into the mask, it's natural to tighten the band around the head. If that band is attached to the face seal, the face seal quickly get pulled out of the hard plastic part of the mask and once that happens the mask is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Odekirk

customer_reviews.title: Fits extremely well
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I've only used these once at a pool hotel. They fit extremely well and the seller even sent me an e-mail on how to prevent them from fogging over. I don't have much experience with this type of product (and I'm not much of swimmer), but since I only bought them to prevent getting chlorine in my eyes and nose I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sarutaru06

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mask!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat this mask. The best way to beat the fogging issues that all masks have is to get some plain colgate toothpaste, rub it on the inside of the lens, let it sit for awhile, then rinse it off. This removes the film that comes inside all dive masks and keeps it from fogging. I do this to all of my masks and have never had a problem. My son "borrowed" this mask from me for one of his dives and likes it so much that he continues to "borrow" it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask, but the strap broke after a few months. I contacted the seller to inquire about buying a new strap. Unfortunately, they did not have a replacement strap, but the seller (copozz official store) mailed me a replacement mask at no charge. I'd highly recommend the mask. I've purchased other copozz products, and they've been very high quality. I love the mask. The excellent customer service was a refreshing surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Living Earth Investments

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so disappointed in a product, as I am with this mask. The description indicates “anti-fog”.... this mask IS NOT anti-fog. The suction was not great either. Adjusting the straps was difficult as well. I gave my mask to a 5 year old, because I couldn’t see clearly under the water, and went to a Dollar store and bought another pair for less than $5.00.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Leak water no matter how tight strap is.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs. They don't form a tight suction to your face no matter how tight you make the strap. The rubber part that should press somewhat hard against your face to form a tight suction seal instead softly rests on your face to form a soft seal that constantly leaks water. Waste of money. Update: 3 days past the 30 day return window one of the straps just snapped. I couldnt return it. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made introductory mask
customer_reviews.text: This low volume mask is sized for a slim or narrow face. It is well made from a soft and giving material that fits well with or without a hood. The minimal skirting has an internal lip that provides a solid comfortable seal that helps prevent mask hickey. I keep one of these masks in my dive kit as a spare for young people. The durability and comfort make it a good match for smaller faced beginner divers; while the low volume style makes for easier mask clearing.
customer_reviews.author: RGWhite

customer_reviews.title: Great mask ata great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mask. I cleaned it with toothpaste and put anti fog stuff on it. It stays incredibly clear and fog free. Very watertight, especially considering i have facial hair. The straps adjust easily and stay tight. Nicest mask I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Bob PA

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The glass lenses are very clear with no visible defects, bubbles, or waves as you may expect from a budget mask. The strap adjusts easily and there is a good field of view. I've only used it on a few shallow fresh water dives so far but I'm happy. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: OK, but fog easily.
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I chose this mask was because it said it was anti-fog, but so far, I’ve had a problem with them fogging up quickly after clearing & then staying fogged. They fit pretty well (I bought them for my kids, but have tried them myself). Overall, they keep water out of your eyes, they just don’t allow for clear underwater viewing at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small but Decent 🤙
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little mask but seems small like for kids. It barely fits me. I got a little water in on the nose piece but I think thats bc of my facial hair. Not a bad mask just needs appropriate big face sizes. 😮
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and fits well`
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about fit as I have a small face, but this mask is so soft it seems to fit well. Haven't been able to do laps as often as usual so haven't given it a very long trial period, but so far seems really nice. Came much earlier than stated, so that was great!
customer_reviews.author: B B.

customer_reviews.title: These items work very well.
customer_reviews.text: The swim mask and snorkel make snorkeling much easier than the old style snorkel (just a tube). This one keeps the water out of the tube so one doesn't have to blow out the water before taking in a breath. The mask keeps the water out even though I have a mustache. Tested in the swimming pool yesterday. Will soon put to the ultimate test for a couple of weeks in Tahiti. I'll update this review upon my return if there are any changes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Craner

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 I spent all year
customer_reviews.text: Like any goggles, these will fog up after a bit of time in the water, but I appreciated the mask's thorough instructions on how to limit that fogging. This is a cute, sturdy, comfortable mask, and it makes my underwater excursions fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! Little pricey, but GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper ones that have similar quality which is the only reason this isn't 5 star, but other then that the product is great. I've used it quite a bit over the past week since I've owned it and it's amazing. Best mask I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Grimes

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and looks of high quality. I use a non-gel toothpaste to scrub the glass for several minutes to clean and prevent fogging. Easy to adjust the strap for the different head coverings I use. The double skirt makes the mask seal well. I will be using the mask again soon and will follow up my review then.😎
customer_reviews.author: Glen H. Klag

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: husband uses this to snorkel in our pool daily ,purchased in march ,strap fell apart today should have purchased extended warrenty & should have lasted longer than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it! No leaks, no fogging. Does appear a little tight around the bottom of nose but that could be due to braces on teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality no leakage
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. The goggles fit great and no water leakage. Tried several different sets of goggles from other companies however this is the first pair that actully works.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: These are great goggles. I was impressed with how easy they were to put on, they fit right out of the box and were comfortable. After cleaning the lenses as directed fogging was not an issue. I ordered these thinking that they could be kids pool goggles if I didn't like them but they are mine!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Deschenes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son! They are exactly what he needed! He tends to throw his goggles around, but these are made of great materials and are comfortable on him! Not a single complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: they still work and seal up great around the faces of my grandkids and my self
customer_reviews.text: it is now the end of summer...and all 4 pair have been used hard...they still work and seal up great around the faces of my grandkids and my self. We have cleaned them with glasses cleaner for the spots...and are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Scuba/Water Mask the works
customer_reviews.text: We starting out using this mask for pool dives, etc. Works well, no leakage and you can see very well underwater. Sure it will do well in other water environments.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Caisse

customer_reviews.title: It does fog
customer_reviews.text: The mask is comfortable enough. I do have some issues with that sometimes leaking, but it definitely does fog. I use anti-fog spray that works fine
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Cool goggles for swimming use
customer_reviews.text: It's cool but it does fog up often but not too bad It's good for my head and helps stay on sealed when needed. Would recommend it if price was better.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hurley

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY MASK & SNORKEL at a GREAT PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These products are awesome. Im very happy with these purchase. The quality of materials used is much better than my other masks and snorkels which I paid much much more than this pair. I will definitely be a repeat customer. Need to buy more for my family. It fits nicely in my face, the strap are so soft and smooth. It looks and feel very expensive as well. I will use this for freediving and spearfishing. I will highly recommend these products and company. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: ARNEL DINO

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 15, 12 and 10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons used these in pool and ocean. They worked as expected, no gagging, no water gushing out when they took them off. Grandsons are 15, 12, 10, average size and weight
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mask for using in the pool for fun. The strap was very easy to adjust, and plenty long for an adults head.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sciria

customer_reviews.title: For kids AND adults
customer_reviews.text: These are the best goggles I’ve ever used. I love that my three yr old can also wear them!! They work perfect for him too. It’s simple to adjust the strap and it stay secure to your face with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go snorkeling in the Gulf. It was a pretty good mask, although it gave me a headache if I wore it for more than an hour. For an armature snorkeler, this mask gets a 10/10, but if you’re a more advanced snorkeler I would definitely buy a different and probably more expensive mask.
customer_reviews.author: melissa norwood

customer_reviews.title: Could not get the mask to stop fogging...
customer_reviews.text: I tried toothpaste, I tried anti fog spray. I ran out of spit on the 3rd day and nothing worked. I was very disappointed with the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Mark fits great! Don't even need the strap, nice snug fit on a small frame face. Awesome field of view as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ifishmo

customer_reviews.title: Good price, works great. Nice and clear.
customer_reviews.text: Good mask, works great. We use it in the pool, but we don't jump in with them on, as they are made with glass. Very clear. Good price. Actually I bought 2. And would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all home pool use!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our teenage son to be used in our home pool. He could not be happier! It has adjustable straps, which allowed a perfect fit. He was amazed at the clarity it gave him under water. This Scuba Mask was everything we were looking for, Top-Kotch!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: People are fools to spend so much on dive masks - I started on a $130 Hollis M3 before I realized you can buy masks like this and the longevity and quality is just as good (sometimes better..) this will be my main mask from now on
customer_reviews.author: Alex Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions on prep for the lenses. The outcome was great. I use some debugger, rinse, then add a little spit to each lens. The lenses stay fog free all during my lap swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Degelia

customer_reviews.title: Does everything the description says.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Follow the instructions they give you to prevent fog.
customer_reviews.author: Pekemommy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Loves these for the pool. They don’t fog up and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: WookiesMom

customer_reviews.title: Hurts bridge of my nose
customer_reviews.text: This mask hurts the bridge of nose soooo badly, and up to the spot between your eyebrows, whatever that’s called. My husband has a larger face and tried it and it hurt his as well. Couldn’t wear it.
customer_reviews.author: emily a nisch

customer_reviews.title: No fogging
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and so far they are crystal clear, no fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of two 0207

customer_reviews.title: Not for an adult and leaked
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Leaks and small for an adult face. Also dogs up quick
customer_reviews.author: krob

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, well-fitting & comfortable, clear view, doesn't fog up (as long as you don't exhale through your nose).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fogs if not cleaned
customer_reviews.text: They do fog up. Need to clean like every mask. Great deal for the price if need a mask
customer_reviews.author: Scubacat

customer_reviews.title: More of a teen size
customer_reviews.text: looking for an adult mask and this was way too small
customer_reviews.author: A. Diamond

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like store-bought masks anymore and is extremely happy with this ...
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this mask for swimming at home and when we go to the lake. He doesn't like store-bought masks anymore and is extremely happy with this mask. He turns 13 this month and he was able to get the mask to fit him well with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: Its a great mask. But not to comfy when you place the goggles on top of your head or on forehead, they are hard.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...but went with a more professional brand...that had a sturdier back strap.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: The silicone seal is nice and soft and fits to the face very easily
customer_reviews.text: This mask sealed to multiple sized small to medium faces without leakage during snorkeling and dives to 30 feet. The silicone seal is nice and soft and fits to the face very easily. The mask colors are nice, however, there is a noticeable small gap between the white and blue hard plastic frame. I can see this getting sand and grit in it quickly. The mask does its job great and is a great low cost option.
customer_reviews.author: Direplatypus

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for underwater use
customer_reviews.text: Use these to go underwater and there is no leakage through the mask. The price was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product, but the adjustable strap seems to rub on the side of our heads. It's the ribbed area, that should be facing out, not in. We use them in our pool at home and haven't had any problems, other than the strap being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best we ever bought
customer_reviews.text: We just use in the pool for games. These seal better and have the best clarity of any we've ever owned. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nana & Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Fogged up immediately
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t sit well on my face , weak suction . Fogged up immediately .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, not tested under water yet.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use this in the water yet, but it feels sooo good on. Very soft rubber, doesn’t cut into face or pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid mask for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal at this price. Mask worked great for diving after using the lighter method on the lens, like I would on any lens. Looks great and its comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have had several masks and some were difficult to get a good watertight seal. This mask seals completely each and every time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Boroughs

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: The boys say they fit great and can see clear
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just fogs up extremely quickly, Excellent product does what it is supposed to do at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dulin

customer_reviews.title: appears well made, but is small
customer_reviews.text: This mask appears well made, but it's just too small for me. maybe best for a child or middle schooler?
customer_reviews.author: msg

customer_reviews.title: Fogs, but good suction
customer_reviews.text: It fogs. I use anti fog spray every time. It has good suction, no leak.
customer_reviews.author: mack

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This swim mask was bought for my 11 year old. They work great. They have great suction and do not leak. They are comfortable and form to the face nicely. They also adjust easily and stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Ang21

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: It fits me perfectly well and very comfortable! Good looking and very good quality! I am so glad I bought this one....thank you !
customer_reviews.author: cathryn

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke, had it less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We had this for less than 2 months before the strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bluespire

customer_reviews.title: Really Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible. They're really comfortable, easy to adjust, and I've had no issues with leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie Cianciosi

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson (9yo)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson. No leak, comfortable fit, easy to adjust and wear. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Italianna

customer_reviews.title: Whre is my mouth piece
customer_reviews.text: I got the mask but not the snorkeling mouth piece....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: The mask was probably too big for my face and ...
customer_reviews.text: The mask was probably too big for my face and that's why it leaked. The sellers were very understanding and cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this mask. It was comfortable, clear view and did not leak or fog up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Massicotte

customer_reviews.title: For the price you get a decent mass.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an Inexpensive mask for beach diving. Give this one a shot and I must say I was impressed. It had a great fit. The rubber around the seal was pretty good. And after using some toothpaste on the lenses, had no problem with fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a little foggy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, they served there purpose while I used them in Destin Florida. Only downside they the do get foggy
customer_reviews.author: crystal pedrique

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not tinted. The main picture makes them appear to be tinted but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Fitment
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price. Used on a dive this weekend and will continue to use it. Absolutely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo J. Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great product, got these to free dive in Jamaica and they worked like a charm. No fog and no seal issues.
customer_reviews.author: Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Good product but fogs up
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loved these but they do fog up. No leaks
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great scuba mask!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really comfortable scuba mask! It’s a good looking mask that fits very well.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: They fit well but fog up easy.. Jane to take them off dip then in water everytime I come up from water
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Broken band after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and glass. But side band broke after a year. And I can't find any way to contact seller. I don't expect 10 years but 1 year? Suspect.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Straps broke after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these for my 9 and 11 year old children to wear to the beach and in the pool. I am disappointed that both pairs have broken after just a couple months of casual use. On both pairs the straps broke on the side. Completely severed.
customer_reviews.author: Marny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dive mask!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask. It has an excellent seal. No water leaked in. It also has a great peripheral vision range. Very happy with this product. Great value! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very very good. Very clear and the rubber has an amazing texture
customer_reviews.author: joe.k

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mask!!! By far better then others and works perfectly so i got 2 pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like how snug they feel on my face along with the black silicone as it makes it darker and easier to see under rocks. Very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: No leaks great used for vacation will still be using next year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well! Will not fog much if you use the toothpaste recommendation.

customer_reviews.title: You will be impressed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best value products I have ever purchased.

customer_reviews.title: size runs small
customer_reviews.text: good quality, soft seal, but runs small causing leaks - recommend for children
customer_reviews.author: Brent Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid fit. I have a larger head. Has a good seal with flexible rubber. Looking forward to diving with them. Same quality as other high end goggles

customer_reviews.title: good.
customer_reviews.text: nice soft rubber material. but leaking in ( nose part) other then that i like it

customer_reviews.text: i feel the picture is misleading. the lens are clear

customer_reviews.title: They fit kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! By far the best I have used. We own four other pairs by different manufacturers and these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fronapel

customer_reviews.title: No leaking or fogging
customer_reviews.text: Just used these snorkeling. Fit was great, no leaking or fogging. Highly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SRoll

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material , leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material , did not seal around face at all. Strap around head is cheap and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best mask ever!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this mask fit my face and did not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerbb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is soft and very comfortable, I do not have to have it overly tight to keep out H2O. Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Chase

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck! Fogs up like most masks unless you use toothpaste or mask defogger
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, do not fog up- would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: TibbeRN

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, better than the dollar store or cheap ones from Walmart, but nothing really special. I'm happy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TCoursey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect goggles for the money
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are fantastic for those with a slightly more narrow face. The black silicone skirt helps a lot with eliminating light refraction while under water and it doesn't leak. Fogging is a slight issue but it can easily be remedied with any anti-fog coating. All around it's a fantastic purchase for the money. It doesn't feel cheaply made and it seems very very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Devine

product_meta.title: COPOZZ Scuba Mask, No Fogging Snorkeling Scuba Dive Glasses, Great Seal Free Diving Tempered Glass Mask Goggles
feature_bullets: 【Double-Lens Panoramic View】Fashion Integrated frame snorkel mask with double lens offers a 180 degree superior view for underwater exploration. Wide and high-grade soft silicone 3d sealing face gasket which molds perfectly to fit any face shape. Diving in style.

【Tempered Glass Lenses】 Scuba mask with shatter-resistant glass lenses to withstand deep water pressure. Scratching resist lens instead of polycarbonate enables you a clearer view under water and hardly to leave any scratches to your lens.

【Great Seal Comfortable Skirt】 Diving mask seals great with wide field of view. The silicone would be comfortably soft and seals on your face very well, which is the most important thing for preventing leaks.The frame looks cool.

【Fit Different Face Shapes】The goggles strap attaches to the skirt instead of the frame as this allows for a variety of face shapes and the mask should seal very well with many of them. Wider nicely shaped skirt help to seal and prevent leaking. Perfect for both diving pros and beginners.

【Adjustable Headband】Simply pull the snorkel mask straps to desired fit and the buckle will hold the straps securely in place. Adjust to fit any swimmer. Perfect for snorkeling, diving, swim training, etc. A great gift for snorkeling lovers.
